text: Polly Scattergood (born 18 October 1986, Colchester, Essex, England), is a British singer-songwriter. She went to the BRIT School. ==Career== Her first album, Polly Scattergood, was released by Mute Records in 2009. Her second album Arrows was released in October 2013. It took three and a half years to make. The first single from Arrows, "Wanderlust", was released in April 2013. On January 21 2014 the video for "Subsequently Lost" was posted on Vimeo. She has remixed "Reunion" by M83 and "You Will Find A Way" by Maps. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Essex Category:People from Colchester
title: Polly Scattergood
